definition: thick paste of fermented soybean/marinated in soy paste/paste/jam
oil/fat/grease/petroleum/to apply tung oil, paint or varnish/oily/greasy/glib/cunning
to buy soy sauce/it's none of my business ("I’m just here to buy some soy sauce")

sentences.english: Daeji Gal-bi is the choice pork ribs specially hand filleted, marinated in the sweet soy sauce.
sentences.chinese: 腌制在甜酱油里的猪肉，吃起来又有另一番风味。

sentences.english: It is usually eaten with soy-bean sauce or orange sauce.
sentences.chinese: 在吃时多半沾酱油加葱或桔酱。

sentences.english: This paper had a study on the Ca strengthener about soy sauce.
sentences.chinese: 本文用几种钙强化剂对酱油进行了钙强化研究。

sentences.english: It's none of my business. I am just passing by.
sentences.chinese: 与我无关，我是来打酱油的。

sentences.english: The stability of iodized soy was analysed theoretically and observed for the first time in the experiment.
sentences.chinese: 首次对加碘酱油的稳定性进行了理论分析和实验观察。

sentences.english: At the same time put forward the technology flow of today's browing sauce production.
sentences.chinese: 同时提出了现代酿造酱油调配生产的工艺流程。

sentences.english: Beef and Chicken Sate, Peanut Soy Sauce, Pressed Rice Cake, Cucumber Pickles.
sentences.chinese: 沙爹鸡肉，牛肉，配花生酱油米饼及酸黄瓜。

sentences.english: Sushi made with seaweed tends to be a little higher in sodium, as is the soy sauce that each piece is dipped in.
sentences.chinese: 用海草做的寿司钠含量挺高的，就像用酱油浸过一样。

sentences.english: Pour in vodak, soya sauces and rock sugar.
sentences.chinese: 淋入加饭酒，酱油及冰糖。

sentences.english: "Jade Rabbit"must have discovered soy sauce in moon. So it is replenished.
sentences.chinese: 玉兔一定是在月亮上发现了酱油，所以他康复了。

sentences.english: To get (or buy) a bottle of soy sauce, housewives in Shenzhen now consider (or think about) going to Hong Kong.
sentences.chinese: 为打一瓶酱油，深圳家庭主妇现在考虑跑一趟香港。

sentences.english: Wear suitable went downstairs to buy soy sauce, bone Harold did not please since to.
sentences.chinese: 戴骨顺下楼买酱油，哈乐却不请自到。

sentences.english: Mr Shaw said He went in and 'wanted to borrow some Soy sauce which was refused'.
sentences.chinese: 肖说何某走进去“想要借点酱油而被拒绝”。

sentences.english: Add in sweetened flour paste, rice wine, sugar and soya sauces Stir briefly.
sentences.chinese: 接着加入甜面酱，加饭酒，砂糖以及酱油略煮。

sentences.english: Put a bit more soy sauce in the food [dish].

definition: chicken bouillon powder (PRC)/essence of chicken, concentrated chicken stock sold as a tonic (Tw)
